data.text:
This is a demo course used to test different block types, we will be adding in new block types as we progress with the test. This is a test of the text block block type.

This is testing how a new paragraph will appear within the same text block. And this is testing how a very long paragraph might appear. Today is a Sunday, it is the 24th of August 2025. This is a very early version of Pebble, there is a huge amount of work left to do, but for now it is just a fun side project.
